sources.title: SpiderBabe (2003)
sources.description: A socially awkward young woman gets bitten by a radioactive spider and becomes a crime-fighting superhero and tries to defeat a nefarious super villain while going after any man (or woman) she wants to bed down with.

metadata.Plot: A socially awkward young woman gets bitten by a radioactive spider and becomes a crime-fighting superhero and tries to defeat a nefarious super villain while going after any man (or woman) she wants to bed down with.
metadata.Writer: John Paul Fedele, Terry M. West
metadata.Actors: Erin Brown, Julian Wells, Darian Caine, Adam Cox
